Posts.Content: adillard23 wrote: Hi i am new to this, but here is my story.  In Feb of 2009 i found a lump in my Left Breast, i soon went to the DR and started the process of Mamm, Ultrasound, and MRI (that did not show anything) The lump continued to grow bigger, i had 2 DR's tell me to just watch it but i was not comfortable with that as my husband and i are trying to have a child.  My OB removed the lump and said that it was normal dense breast tissue.  Well this last week i have found another that just popped up, i had a Mamm and Ultrasound today with no results again.  Does anyone have any ideas on what this could be and why this keeps happening?  I am only 30 years old and would like to stop getting scared about each lump that pops up.   Thanks  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dense Breast Lump adillard23 kat56

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2009 08:17PM adillard23 wrote: Thanks for the help.  I just hate having to have a surgery so often.  I have a good friend that has been fighting BC for the past couple of years and was told to just watch her lump, if she would not have pushed she would not be where she is today, so because of that i am very proactive.  I still dont understand why they cant tell me what it is and why they keep coming up, the DR's just look at you like you are crazy when you are not willing to just watch it.  Thank you so much for your support and input.
Posts.Title: Dense Breast Lump adillard23 kat56
